skills.skill: Infoblox and F5 Vendor Products Familiarity
DNS and IP Address Management Engineering
Load Balancer and Webproxy Services Maintenance
Operations related to DNS, IPAM, Load Balancer, and Webproxy Services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Be responsible for the Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Wide Area Network (WAN) overall architecture.
Perform lab equipment evaluation, integration, and testing.
Assist with the security accreditation process.
Develop and maintain relevant technical documentation.
Support Tier-4 production troubleshooting and develop proactive network analysis solutions for the operations team.
Familiarity with Infoblox and F5 vendor products.
Engineering, developing, and maintaining Domain Name Service (DNS), IP Address Management (IPAM), Load Balancer, and Webproxy services.
Operations related to DNS, IPAM, Load Balancer, and Webproxy services.

education_certification.credential: Doctorate, Masters, Bachelors, Associates or HS degree with experience equating to 16 years. Must meet Information Assurance Technical (IAT) Level 2 certification requirements.
